Author: VodkaSodaSpirit
Text: i have social anxiety and an eating disorder but idk that that means anything. my social anxiety definitely influences my comfort level with food-related things (ie i hate ordering food at restaurants, i feel judged eating in front of people, etc) and that was how i felt before i developed an eating disorder so that i at least know was social anxiety.  i know a lot of mental illnesses are comorbid and i believe anxiety disorders and eating disorders go hand in hand for a lot of people!
